seo.title: About Us | Senghor University
seo.description: Discover Senghor University of Alexandria, an international French-speaking university serving African development for over 30 years.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: International French-speaking university serving African development

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To train, in French, creative leaders capable of meeting the challenges of sustainable development in Africa.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become a major player in training and capacity building for executives in Africa and for Africa.

about.slogan: Where Africa's tomorrow is prepared, built, and invented

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.text: Academic standards and intellectual rigor in service of quality.

ethics.title: Ethics
ethics.text: Responsibility, integrity, commitment, respect for individuals and the common good.

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.text: Valuing diverse backgrounds, languages and cultures, promoting gender equality.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: Creativity, action research, collective intelligence, and openness to digital and AI.

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.text: Partnership, mutual support, scientific dialogue, and university diplomacy.

history.title: Our History
history.summary: Since 1989, the Senghor project embodies the vision of an African university of excellence. Discover the key milestones of our development.

governance.title: Governance
governance.summary: 15 African countries support our mission. Discover our founding texts and the members of the Board of Directors.

strategy.title: Our Strategy
strategy.summary: The Strategic Plan defines our ambitions to train tomorrow's leaders and support Africa's transformation.

organization.title: Our Organization
organization.summary: 5 academic departments, dedicated services, and a committed team serving our students' success.

team.title: Our Staff
team.summary: Faculty, researchers, and administrative staff: discover the faces of those who bring the University to life every day.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.summary: External campuses across Africa and strategic partnerships with universities and organizations worldwide.

careers.title: Join Us
careers.summary: Join an international university at the heart of Africa. Opportunities for faculty, researchers, and administrative staff.
